/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and buses, integral parts of the city's transportation network, are scattered along the road, hinting at the rhythm of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
